title: MORG E BUGGED
body: Uhm, anyone else notice problems with morg E since new patch yesterday? It's not blocking slows, stuns etc. I noticed against thresh, and karma. Both their Q's weren't being blocked. wasn't just me noticing, everyone was commenting on it.

replies.body:
I thought thresh hook always ignores, you just can't follow through during shield..
And do you mean you were still being slowed by Karmas Q or what..
